text: One Last Deal () is a 2018 Finnish drama film directed by Klaus Härö and written by Anna Heinämaa. It was screened in the Contemporary World Cinema section at the 2018 Toronto International Film Festival. ==Cast== * Heikki Nousiainen as Olavi * Pirjo Lonka as Lea * Amos Brotherus as Otto * Stefan Sauk as Albert Johnson ==References== ==External links== * Category:2018 films Category:2018 drama films Category:Finnish films Category:Finnish drama films Category:Finnish-language films Category:Films directed by Klaus Härö
title: One Last Deal
